value.name: Family of 14-year-old girl who died in mass shooting in N. Charleston calling for justice
value.description: The family of a 14-year-old girl who died in a mass shooting over the weekend in North Charleston is speaking out about their call for justice in her killing.

value.name: Hamden resident faces charges after officials say he masturbated in a pharmacy
value.description: A town resident is facing charges following an incident in a Hamden Walgreens, according to police. Officials charged Jabron Matheney with public indecency and second-degree breach of peace, a release from Capt.

value.name: Gun homicides surge in US as Covid lockdowns end
value.description: The year-long surge in gun murders across the United States has shown no sign of easing as Covid lockdowns end, with a jump in shootings over the weekend that left dozens dead or injured.

value.name: Coroner releases name of 14-year-old girl killed in gunfight that wounded 14 more
value.description: The Charleston County Coroner’s Office has released the name of a 14-year-old girl killed at an unauthorized concert in North Charleston this weekend.

value.name: Police: Hamden resident charged with possession of child pornography
value.description: A Hamden resident was arrested Wednesday and charged with first-degree possession of child pornography, according to police. The resident, 37-year-old Thomas Digrazio, posted a $50,000 bond and was released,

value.name: Man Accused Of Public Indecency In Walgreens: Hamden Police
value.description: A Hamden man was arrested after a public indecency incident inside a Walgreens last week, according to police. Police responded to Walgreens at 1191 Dixwell Ave. on May 20 and the officer was "waved down" by the store manager regarding a public indecency complaint,

value.name: Man accused of masturbating behind customer at Hamden Walgreen's
value.description: A Hamden man was arrested after police say he had been publicly masturbating inside a local Walgreen's. According to Hamden Police Capt. Ronald Smith, Officer Timothy Janus was "waved down" by the store manager of the 1191 Dixwell Avenue location around 10:45 Thursday night.

value.name: Pregnant woman killed when gun goes off in vehicle in Laurel
value.description: WBAL NewsRadio 1090/FM 101.5 - A Laurel man is facing charges in connection with the shooting death of a pregnant woman.

value.name: Hamden police: 85-year-old woman injured in violent street robbery
value.description: An 85-year-old woman suffered a fractured shoulder in an alleged street robbery during which she was knocked to the ground, police said. Officers responded to 2100 Dixwell Ave. for the reported street robbery at about 3:45 p.

value.name: Suspect in death of pregnant Laurel woman, unborn child charged with manslaughter
value.description: A pregnant Laurel woman and her unborn child are both dead after a man says he accidentally fired a weapon into the back of the seat she was sitting in while they rode in a car.
